DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether prophylactic antipyretic treatment vaccination Prevenar concomitant hexavalent DTPa combination vaccine reduce rate febrile reaction .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Treatment Fever Children Who Have Been Vaccinated With Prevenar Infanrix Hexa
